Ontological Engineering 
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez,
Example of Content Pattern: Participation 
• This NeOn Ontology Modelling Component represents 
participation at spatio-temporal location .
General Information 
Name 
Participation 
Identifier 
CP-PA-01 
Type of Component 
Content Pattern (CP) 
Use Case 
General 
Express that objects take part in events.  
Examples 
Suppose that someones wants to represent people which 
take part in an international conference.
speaker: SYSTEM
